list.name: Changes
list.comment: Added the all in one bundle of MondayCybersecurityReport file to do all the necessary reports - need to add the python code for Jira as well and then repackage in a new project so it's one and done when creating / reporting

task.summary: updating the new database code - everything is working and had been validated
making some fine grain changes, the core of the application remains the same
made some minor changes that now only track active accounts for signins 30-180 and added the date to the filename.
made some minor changes that now only track active accounts for signins 30-180 and added the date to the filename.
all these problems caused by running powershell as administrator .. so silly! The libraries were installed for "user" - so naturally, admin didn't have them availble. No different than pip :(
working well, just adding a wrapper to eventually add all these reports into a single call command shell
changed $minDays = (Get-Date).AddDays(-35) to give a long weekend for users that only log in monthly

Added the all in one bundle of MondayCybersecurityReport file to do all the necessary reports - need to add the python code for Jira as well and then repackage in a new project so it's one and done when creating / reporting
